text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump Yes he has. ⬇️

☑️ 39,068 US deaths and rising
☑️ 740,151 confirmed cases of Covid-19
☑️ an infinity of lies
☑️  too many obnoxious daily briefings filled with more lies, rants, and medical quackery.

What did he deliver in February?  Oh, thats right, not a damn thing!
